headline: Buying A Dollar For 50 Cents: 2 Stocks I Believe Every Long-Term Investor Should Consider

headline: Melius Initiates Coverage on Diamondback Energy (FANG), Assigns Buy Rating
summary: Diamondback Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ:FANG) is one of the best dividend stocks to buy. On August 20, Melius Research assigned a Buy rating on FANG, along with a price target of $213. Diamondback is one of the major Permian Basin pure-play companies, where it directs its streamlined operations toward Wolfcamp, Spraberry, and Bone Spring formations. Melius […]
